citeinfo.origin:
North Pacific Groundfish Observer Program, compiler and editor
National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA)
citeinfo.title: North Pacific Domestic Groundfish Observer Database

descript.abstract: Contains commercial catch and biomass parameters of groundfish species collected by observers aboard domestic (US) commercial fishing vessels operating in the US EEZ of the Bering Sea and North Pacific Ocean.
descript.purpose: Management of Gulf of Alaska and Bering Sea groundfish fishery.

idinfo.accconst: Contact Martin Loefflad for information. Privacy Act constraints prohibit general access. Data sharing agreements can be arranged.
idinfo.useconst: Contact Martin Loefflad for information. Privacy Act constraints prohibit general access. Data sharing agreements can be arranged.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.
